DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the PRAM study was to determine whether women diagnosed with hypertension in pregnancy, using the traditional mercury device, have the same pregnancy outcomes when blood pressure is measured by either an automated device or a mercury device throughout the pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Blood Pressure in Pregnancy Using Mercury and Automated Device
DOC.criteria: women with a diagnosis of hypertension in pregnancy nonpregnant and normotensive pregnancy women
